settings.title:
Introducing Fièra HD
Matte Finishing Powder
settings.sub_title: The most overlooked final touch to a woman’s makeup routine that ties everything together. The key to a smooth, matte finish.
settings.content: If you want to bring your makeup routine to the next level and achieve a gorgeous matte finish, this finishing powder is a must-have.

settings.title: How Fièra HD Matte <br class="forMob">Finishing Powder Works
settings.sub_title: Fièra HD Finishing Powder is the key to bringing your makeup routine above and beyond by diffusing stubborn imperfections, absorbing excess oil, and giving your skin a velvety, matte finish. The missing, final step to gorgeous, even, and younger-looking skin.
settings.content_1: Those stubborn imperfections that your makeup just can’t cover? Gone in a near-instant. Vanquishes the apperance of those stubborn wrinkles, fine lines, dark spots and other skin impurities.
settings.content_2: Absorbs that excess oil to reduce shine and make the skin appear softer, smoother, and more even-toned.
settings.content_3: By removing excess oil and moisture, a more velvety, matte finish to your skin is revealed. Leaving you with less shine and a more smooth, even-toned and youthful appearance.
settings.content_4: Keeps your skin looking matte, smooth and youthful throughout the entire day or deep into the night.

settings.title: Our Fièra Promise
settings.content: Fièra is not your average beauty line. We offer the highest quality products with unstoppable results. Our products focus on delivering innovative science, quality, and convenience. Not just a beauty brand, Fièra is committed to supporting our community through our partnerships with Food Rescue US and Second Harvest by donating a portion of our sales to help feed those in need.

settings.title: Silica
settings.content: Helps pull excess moisture from the skin and stops shine for a smooth, matte finish.

settings.title: Lauroyl Lysine
settings.content: An amino acid that aids in skin protection and makes the skin feel softer.

settings.title: Oryza Sativa Starch
settings.content: Made from rice, this powerfully natural ingredient helps reduce the visible signs of aging while absorbing excess oil for smoother, younger-looking skin.

settings.title: Zea Mays Starch
settings.content: Gives the skin a pleasant feel and mattifying effect by reducing excess oil and eliminating shininess.

settings.title: Active Ingredients
settings.sub_title: 100% natural, yet extremely powerful ingredients designed to absorb excess oil, moisture and give your skin the smooth, velvety, matte finish it's been looking for.
settings.popup_content:
Talc, Calcium Carbonate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Iron Oxides 
(CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).

settings.content: Dip brush into powder and shake off excess.
Apply in circular motions, paying close attention to the T-Zone.
Can be applied to foundation for a flawless finish or worn alone to keep the skin looking young, smooth and even-toned.

settings.title: 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
settings.content: We’re so confident you'll love our Fièra products we offer a Hassle-free 30 day Money Back Guarantee less shipping & handling. If you're not satisfied with your purchase simply return the items back to us for a full refund less shipping costs.
